file_content.text: I feel so strange.
I'm running, chest hurts, something's in my head. Rain's coming down. Everything's sinking into the ground.
Potent stuff--haven't seen anyone zoned out like that since Nar Shaddaa.
I thin--I think I know you, but I... I don't remember anything. I don't--I don't know what you want. Everything hurts.
I'm looking for someone. Can you help me?
Let's talk.
I can help you. Let me help you.
Tell me where Jurithus is or I'll hurt you more.
The pain's just starting.
The serum is making you delusional.
It's the SLV-16.
Oh? I'm delusional. I don't know what to do with my hands.
I don't know what to do with my head. Please tell me.
Obey me. Tell me about Jurithus.
I need information.
Do you know of a slave who stole coded messages?
Think about who's here.
Help me find Jurithus, and I'll help you.
Let's work together.
Jurithus. Jurithus is gone. Days gone, now.
It all goes so slowly. Jurithus burns and starts to look like our colossus. Incomplete....
Jurithus died fighting in the jungle. I don't remember why we were fighting. Jurithus died, I know that.
Do you know where he kept his belongings?
What about his possessions?
He kept his old life with him. Strange life, strange datapads--he thought they were valuable.
Listen to me carefully. I need to know where Jurithus died.
Where?
You should be proud. You were fighting for your freedom.
You fought for a good cause.
I know that word. I don't remember that word.
Jurithus died with Sathun, and Rennith, and Avoira. All aliens. All friends. All fighting beside the foot of the statue. Jurithus is still there, if the beasts haven't eaten him.
I'll check the pile of alien corpses, then. Shouldn't be too hard to find.
Got it.
Thank you.
You better hope he has what I want.
He best be.
What should I think about now? I don't know what to do with my head. I don't know what to do with my hands....
Don't worry. You don't have to think anymore.
It's over. [Kill him]
I don't have to think. Thank you....
Cripes. Don't think he even felt it.
It's time to stop fighting. Go surrender yourself to the troops.
Turn yourself in.
The troops--I don't know why I fought them. I'm going to them....
Guess he didn't have much dignity, but I wouldn't want to be him when he wakes up.
The serum will wear off--you'll be okay. After that, do whatever you want.
Doesn't matter to me.
But I don't know what to do. My head is hollow. It hurts....
